We start by obtaining the ASCII chart (http://www.asciitable.com/) and the hostname of the website (www.*.*) or if no hostname is given, the current website's URL
This is basically Caesar's Cipher.

For this example we will be using the hostname
store.steampowered.com
Now, for each letter we will convert it to ASCII and define its position in the string (Letter)

s = 115           Letter = 0
t = 116           Letter = 1
o = 111           Letter = 2
r = 114           Letter = 3
e = 101           Letter = 4
. = 46            Letter = 5
s = 115           Letter = 6
t = 116           Letter = 7
e = 101           Letter = 8
a = 97            Letter = 9
m = 109           Letter = 10
p = 112           Letter = 11
o = 111           Letter = 12
w = 119           Letter = 13
e = 101           Letter = 14
r = 114           Letter = 15
e = 101           Letter = 16
d = 100           Letter = 17
. = 46            Letter = 18
c = 99            Letter = 19
o = 111           Letter = 20
m = 109           Letter = 21

We then combine the ASCII values to form the key which in this case is
11511611111410146115166101971091121111191011004699111109
'key' will be defined as 11511611111410146115166101971091121111191011004699111109.

The length of the string (hostname) is 22.
We will also define 'length' as 22.

Now we will plug each individual character with their respective numbers into the formula.
The formula is
⌈|-length^lnum / letter + letter^lnum * length / (34 + lnum^letter - length^key + letter * key / lnum) * lnum^length % 23 + key|⌉ % (126 - 33) + 33.

After retrieving the answer convert the number back to the character equivalent of the ASCII value.

s = ⌈|-22^115 / 0 + 0^115 * 22 / (34 + 115^0 - 22^11511611111410146115166101971091121111191011004699111109 + 0 * 11511611111410146115166101971091121111191011004699111109 / 115) * 115^22 % 23 + 11511611111410146115166101971091121111191011004699111109|⌉ % (126 - 33) + 33 = 68 = D
t = ⌈|-22^116 / 1 + 1^116 * 22 / (34 + 116^1 - 22^11511611111410146115166101971091121111191011004699111109 + 1 * 11511611111410146115166101971091121111191011004699111109 / 116) * 116^22 % 23 + 11511611111410146115166101971091121111191011004699111109|⌉ % (126 - 33) + 33 = 120 = x
o = ⌈|-22^111 / 2 + 2^111 * 22 / (34 + 111^2 - 22^11511611111410146115166101971091121111191011004699111109 + 2 * 11511611111410146115166101971091121111191011004699111109 / 111) * 111^22 % 23 + 11511611111410146115166101971091121111191011004699111109|⌉ % (126 - 33) + 33 = 91 = [
r = ⌈|-22^114 / 3 + 3^114 * 22 / (34 + 114^3 - 22^11511611111410146115166101971091121111191011004699111109 + 3 * 11511611111410146115166101971091121111191011004699111109 / 114) * 114^22 % 23 + 11511611111410146115166101971091121111191011004699111109|⌉ % (126 - 33) + 33 = 62 = >
e = ⌈|-22^101 / 4 + 4^101 * 22 / (34 + 101^4 - 22^11511611111410146115166101971091121111191011004699111109 + 4 * 11511611111410146115166101971091121111191011004699111109 / 101) * 101^22 % 23 + 11511611111410146115166101971091121111191011004699111109|⌉ % (126 - 33) + 33 = 115 = s
. = ⌈|-22^46 / 5 + 5^46 * 22 / (34 + 46^5 - 22^11511611111410146115166101971091121111191011004699111109 + 5 * 11511611111410146115166101971091121111191011004699111109 / 46) * 46^22 % 23 + 11511611111410146115166101971091121111191011004699111109|⌉ % (126 - 33) + 33 = 102 = f
s = ⌈|-22^115 / 6 + 6^115 * 22 / (34 + 115^6 - 22^11511611111410146115166101971091121111191011004699111109 + 6 * 11511611111410146115166101971091121111191011004699111109 / 115) * 115^22 % 23 + 11511611111410146115166101971091121111191011004699111109|⌉ % (126 - 33) + 33 = 53 = 5
t = ⌈|-22^116 / 7 + 7^116 * 22 / (34 + 116^7 - 22^11511611111410146115166101971091121111191011004699111109 + 7 * 11511611111410146115166101971091121111191011004699111109 / 116) * 116^22 % 23 + 11511611111410146115166101971091121111191011004699111109|⌉ % (126 - 33) + 33 = 108 = l
e = ⌈|-22^101 / 8 + 8^101 * 22 / (34 + 101^8 - 22^11511611111410146115166101971091121111191011004699111109 + 8 * 11511611111410146115166101971091121111191011004699111109 / 101) * 101^22 % 23 + 11511611111410146115166101971091121111191011004699111109|⌉ % (126 - 33) + 33 = 64 = @
a = ⌈|-22^97 / 9 + 9^97 * 22 / (34 + 97^9 - 22^11511611111410146115166101971091121111191011004699111109 + 9 * 11511611111410146115166101971091121111191011004699111109 / 97) * 97^22 % 23 + 11511611111410146115166101971091121111191011004699111109|⌉ % (126 - 33) + 33 = 72 = H
m = ⌈|-22^109 / 10 + 10^109 * 22 / (34 + 109^10 - 22^11511611111410146115166101971091121111191011004699111109 + 10 * 11511611111410146115166101971091121111191011004699111109 / 109) * 109^22 % 23 + 11511611111410146115166101971091121111191011004699111109|⌉ % (126 - 33) + 33 = 45 = -
p = ⌈|-22^112 / 11 + 11^112 * 22 / (34 + 112^11 - 22^11511611111410146115166101971091121111191011004699111109 + 11 * 11511611111410146115166101971091121111191011004699111109 / 112) * 112^22 % 23 + 11511611111410146115166101971091121111191011004699111109|⌉ % (126 - 33) + 33 = 68 = D
o = ⌈|-22^111 / 12 + 12^111 * 22 / (34 + 111^12 - 22^11511611111410146115166101971091121111191011004699111109 + 12 * 11511611111410146115166101971091121111191011004699111109 / 111) * 111^22 % 23 + 11511611111410146115166101971091121111191011004699111109|⌉ % (126 - 33) + 33 = 36 = $
w = ⌈|-22^119 / 13 + 13^119 * 22 / (34 + 119^13 - 22^11511611111410146115166101971091121111191011004699111109 + 13 * 11511611111410146115166101971091121111191011004699111109 / 119) * 119^22 % 23 + 11511611111410146115166101971091121111191011004699111109|⌉ % (126 - 33) + 33 = 122 = z
e = ⌈|-22^101 / 14 + 14^101 * 22 / (34 + 101^14 - 22^11511611111410146115166101971091121111191011004699111109 + 14 * 11511611111410146115166101971091121111191011004699111109 / 101) * 101^22 % 23 + 11511611111410146115166101971091121111191011004699111109|⌉ % (126 - 33) + 33 = 97 = a
r = ⌈|-22^114 / 15 + 15^114 * 22 / (34 + 114^15 - 22^11511611111410146115166101971091121111191011004699111109 + 15 * 11511611111410146115166101971091121111191011004699111109 / 114) * 114^22 % 23 + 11511611111410146115166101971091121111191011004699111109|⌉ % (126 - 33) + 33 = 113 = q
e = ⌈|-22^101 / 16 + 16^101 * 22 / (34 + 101^16 - 22^11511611111410146115166101971091121111191011004699111109 + 16 * 11511611111410146115166101971091121111191011004699111109 / 101) * 101^22 % 23 + 11511611111410146115166101971091121111191011004699111109|⌉ % (126 - 33) + 33 = 74 = J
d = ⌈|-22^100 / 17 + 17^100 * 22 / (34 + 100^17 - 22^11511611111410146115166101971091121111191011004699111109 + 17 * 11511611111410146115166101971091121111191011004699111109 / 100) * 100^22 % 23 + 11511611111410146115166101971091121111191011004699111109|⌉ % (126 - 33) + 33 = 36 = $
. = ⌈|-22^46 / 18 + 18^46 * 22 / (34 + 46^18 - 22^11511611111410146115166101971091121111191011004699111109 + 18 * 11511611111410146115166101971091121111191011004699111109 / 46) * 46^22 % 23 + 11511611111410146115166101971091121111191011004699111109|⌉ % (126 - 33) + 33 = 120 = x
c = ⌈|-22^99 / 19 + 19^99 * 22 / (34 + 99^19 - 22^11511611111410146115166101971091121111191011004699111109 + 19 * 11511611111410146115166101971091121111191011004699111109 / 99) * 99^22 % 23 + 11511611111410146115166101971091121111191011004699111109|⌉ % (126 - 33) + 33 = 49 = 1
o = ⌈|-22^111 / 20 + 20^111 * 22 / (34 + 111^20 - 22^11511611111410146115166101971091121111191011004699111109 + 20 * 11511611111410146115166101971091121111191011004699111109 / 111) * 111^22 % 23 + 11511611111410146115166101971091121111191011004699111109|⌉ % (126 - 33) + 33 = 122 = z
m = ⌈|-22^109 / 21 + 21^109 * 22 / (34 + 109^21 - 22^11511611111410146115166101971091121111191011004699111109 + 21 * 11511611111410146115166101971091121111191011004699111109 / 109) * 109^22 % 23 + 11511611111410146115166101971091121111191011004699111109|⌉ % (126 - 33) + 33 = 83 = S

After you complete everything, concatenate everything sequentially to form the password
Password: Dx[>sf5l@H-D$zaqJ$x1zS
